dataObject.content: While the overwhelming majority of Americans choose to have their children vaccinated, the number of children who go completely unvaccinated is rising.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Using a combination of surveys and focus groups, the KFF COVID-19 Vaccine Monitor will track the dynamic nature of public reactions as vaccine development "}

{"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"The statement was simply stating statistics. There are Americans who choose to not vaccinate their children. There isn't any inherent personal belief injected into the statement."}
